prioritization_criteria.critical: Blocking issues or major opportunities affecting core functionality
prioritization_criteria.high: Significant impact on rankings or AI visibility, quick wins

why_dry_climates: Lower SEO competition than coastal markets (LA, NYC, Miami)
Higher skin dryness/dehydration prevalence creates active search demand
Seasonal content opportunities (winter dryness, summer heat)
Local competitors are mostly med-spas, not e-commerce brands
Hyaluronic acid and hydration products naturally align with market needs

ultra_smooth_skin_scottsdale.opportunity: Position Ayonne as the online alternative with AI analysis

skincare_5280_denver.opportunity: Capture DIY/home skincare audience with AI recommendations

implementation_notes: Changes to ayonne.skin require Shopify theme edits or manual content updates
Changes to ai.ayonne.skin can be implemented directly in this codebase

Avoid medical claims in all content
Regional landing pages should include LocalBusiness schema variant
Seasonal content should be published 4-6 weeks before season starts
